es.uam.eps.bmi.search.searching

Class LuceneSearcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uam.eps.bmi.search.searching.LuceneSearcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Searcher

    public class LuceneSearcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements Searcher
    This class represents a Lucene searcher built using the Lucene library.

      • LuceneSearcher

        public LuceneSearcher()

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public void build(Index index)
        Creates a searcher using the given index. This searcher only supports LuceneIndex instances as index.
        Specified by:
        build in interface Searcher
        Parameters:
        index - Index used to create the searcher.

      • search

        public java.util.List<ScoredTextDocument> search(java.lang.String query)
        Returns a ranking of documents sorted by the score value or null if the search couldn't be done.
        Specified by:
        search in interface Searcher
        Parameters:
        query - Query used to search.
        Returns:
        a ranking of documents sorted by the score value or null if the search couldn't be done.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main class for Lucene searcher. Builds a searcher and asks the user for queries, showing the TOP 5 results.
        Parameters:
        args - The following arguments are used: index_path: Path to a directory containing a Lucene index.
